name: Pecos Punch from West of Pecos
description: The house drink at San Francisco's West of Pecos restaurant features freshly muddled cantaloupe—Pecos, Texas is known for the fruit.

recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker, muddle cantaloupe until broken down. Fill shaker with ice. Add basil, tequila, Aperol, agave syrup, and grapefruit juice and shake vigorously. Strain into ice filled serving glass (or tin cowboy cup). Garnish with lemon wheel.
